org.bm.blaise.scribo.parser
Interface GrammarParser

All Known Implementing Classes:
TokenParser
public interface GrammarParser

Converts an input String into a SemanticNode, using an associated grammar. The primary method of interest is parseTree, which handles the conversion of a string input into a semantic tree (returning the top node of that tree).

Author:
elisha

Method Summary
 SemanticNode parseTree(java.lang.String expression)
          Converts a string expression into a token tree.
 void setGrammar(Grammar grammar)
          Sets grammar backing the parser.
 

Method Detail

setGrammar

Sets grammar backing the parser.

parseTree

SemanticNode parseTree(java.lang.String expression)
                       throws ParseException
Converts a string expression into a token tree.

Parameters:
expression - the string input to the parser
Returns:
a SemanticNode which is the top node in the tree
Throws:
ParseException - if the parser fails in some way to parse the input
